name: Kuаитuм
description:
Kuаитuм is a soviet-themed 3D platform puzzle game made with Unreal Engine 4 in 7 days during the Epic MegaJam 2020 by a team of 5 developers.

Featuring 5 levels where our mysterious protagonist will use his gadget to shift between the grim reality and a past where humanity wasn't yet lost, traversing the now abandoned facilities where it all began, in hopes of finding the source of the catastrophe and avoid Armageddon before it happens, but salvation has a cost...

Watch the gameplay video!

You can play with keyboard (WASD to move, Spacebar to jump, Shift to run, R to teleport, E to interact) or Gamepad (Joystick to move, A to jump, RT to run, X to interact and LT to teleport).

You can find us on twitter @MicosMacosGames, on itch.io (MicosMacos) or email us at micosmacos.games@gmail.com.
If you are more interested in the code or the Unreal 4 Project, you can checkout our repository and our github page, @MicosMacosGames.

Make sure you also checkout the repositories of our members, @lucho1, @rleonborras, @DidacRomero, @ch0m5 and @X0KA!

Contents Developed or Acquired Before the Epic GameJam 2020 Start:

  • 3D Assets
  • Outline Material and Blur Material were made following a couple of tutorials
    • BaseMesh Player’s backpack - https://free3d.com/3d-model/backpackrockclimbing-v1--688286.html
    • BaseMesh  Militar Boots - https://www.turbosquid.com/es/3d-models/3d-model-boots-shoes-1500958
    • Male Base Mesh - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/free-base-mesh-e4049b5274904bf5ab91001b2bc25eae
    • Metal Materials - https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/p/jNlN/vintage-sci-fi-pack-80-smart-materials - Standard License
    • Brick Wall Material - https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/p/M63A/substance-brick-wall-material - Standard License
    • Metal Material  - https://www.artstation.com/marketplace/p/j38g/pbr-texture-rusty-metal-floor
    • Megascans 
      • 3D Meshes -> Barely Plant - Inch Plant - Concrete Rubber Pile
      • Surfaces -> Black and white tiles - Debris Floor
  • Fonts
    • Kroftsmann - https://www.1001fonts.com/kroftsmann-font.html
    • Coolvetica - https://www.1001fonts.com/coolvetica-font.html
  • SFX Bought through SoundSnap yearly subscription:

All SFX are direct or modified versions of the following files. Files can be found by searching on the soundsnap website. The list includes the name of the audio file and the specific provider of such audio.

  • Elemental - sand - casting 5 - SoundMorph
  • Whistling wind occasional changes fairly steady, barren landscape 2  -  CA Sound
  • Handfull of gravel spilling and scattering (1). - Eiravaein Works
  • Low, ominous drone. - Badlands
  • Electric static spark (3).    -      Electric Static Spark
  • Big metal mechanical lever - crank, clunky gears, reverberant. (2)    - Richard Humphries 
  • Button click select 1.            - Fusehive
  • UI Element, button - quick, hovering beep.            - Smackheads
  • Brake machine, engaging. Metallic pounding. Hydraulic machine pounding metal with thuds and rattles.            - BLASTWAVE FX
  • Boiler room metal door close 1    - Airborne Sound
  • Pulling and grabbing at a locked file cabinet drawer        - BLASTWAVE FX
  • Alarm clock - plastic - pressing and pushing a button - on and off - snapping and clicking - button getting stuck being pushed in - thud.            -All You Can Eat Audio
  • Large Electrical Mains Power Lever Switch Off, Metallic Impact Stinger, Big Reverb    - Tom Hutchings
  • Pounding flare being shot (2).        - Soundmorph   
  • Elemental - electricity - casting - loopable 2.            - Soundmorph
  • Ambience - interior - old building - 3rd floor - in front of 3 Westinghouse elevators - doors closed - humming 2.            - All You Can Eat Audio
  • Standard wall clock ticking, with room tone.             - WW Audio
  • Robot - devices - door - heavy metal gate 4.            - Soundmorph
  • Human crashes and lands on a car hood, metal bang and hit        - BLASTWAVE FX
  • Footsteps on Metal - Sneaker stopping tracks, close perspective.    - Tovusound
  • Smart shoes walking on tile with standard footsteps.    - Badlands
